name: ThingSmartBaseKit
prefix_header_contents:
#ifdef __OBJC__
  #import <ThingSmartBaseKit/ThingSmartBaseKit.h>
  #import <ThingSmartNetworkKit/ThingSmartNetworkKit.h>
  #undef ThingLog
  #undef ThingSDKLogDebug
  #undef ThingSDKLogInfo
  #undef ThingSDKLogWarn
  #undef ThingSDKLogError
  #define ThingSDKLogDebug(...)         ThingSDKLog(0, @"ThingSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogInfo(...)         ThingSDKLog(1, @"ThingSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogWarn(...)         ThingSDKLog(2, @"ThingSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
  #define ThingSDKLogError(...)         ThingSDKLog(3, @"ThingSmartBaseKit", __FILE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)

  #import <YYModel/YYModel.h>
  #import "ThingBaseNotificationUtils.h"

#endif
